attributes.action: hold a referendum on immigration,with those voting in favour paying the cost equaly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most immigration is costing the uk tax payer a small fortune,wouldn't it be a fairer system if we all had a right to choose.If you vote in favour of this continued mass influx to the uk you must also be prepared to pay to support it,if you don't then vote NO and take the more cost effective option,it realy would be a better way and the results would speak for themselves.
